input.sentences: this church looks like it has been here for a very long time
this dog seems to be living in what we would call paradise .
it amazes me that vehicles actually drive on this road .
the walkway to the house is line with beautiful plant life .
output.sentences: I live in an old house in the country
There is a beach nearby that my dog likes
We walk on the beach every day
There is a trail that goes directly to the beach from my house
We have planted nice plants along the side of the trail
